Tradesy | Santa Monica, CA | ONSITE full-time Position with the Engineering Team:

We are looking for an Engineering Lead - Test Automation

+professional experience with functional, integration, and unit testing frameworks such as Selenium or PHPUnit

+ Experience developing testing plans

+Competency in multiple programming languages

+Comfortable working with the linux command line

+Experience with continuous integration and delivery pipelines

+Experience with testing mobile applications a plus

About Tradesy:

Tradesy is a marketplace with a current focus on high end fashion. We're looking for an experienced test automation engineer that can lead our test automation efforts! This position will focus on a range of software testing from functional and integration testing all the way to performance and load testing. There will also be strong ownership over continuous integration, continuous delivery, and release management.
